definitions.definition: The gentle or kind exercise of power ; leniency , mercy ; compassion in judging or punishing.
A pardon , commutation , or similar reduction, removal, or postponement of legal penalties by an executive officer of a state.

main_definition: The gentle or kind exercise of power ; leniency , mercy ; compassion in judging or punishing.
secondary_definitions: ( law ) A pardon , commutation , or similar reduction, removal, or postponement of legal penalties by an executive officer of a state.
